department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: On-going opportunity for qualification for supply arrangement series E60HN-16ELEC for electrical and electronic products.
description: This Request for Supply Arrangement(RFSA) is to provide for the supply, as required, of various electrical and electronic products from categories presented at Annexes A1 and A2 of the solicitation.
duration_in_months: The contract is open from 2028-11-30 to 14:00:00
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
E60HN-16ELEC: Request for Supply Arrangement for Electrical and Electronic Products

#### General Information
[Reference Number]: WS4298673451-Doc4332306790
[Amendment Number]: 0
[Publication Date]: 2023-12-01
[Tender Closing Date]: 2028-11-30 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

#### Opportunity Overview
This ongoing Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) invites qualified suppliers to submit offers for a supply arrangement series, E60HN-16ELEC, for electrical and electronic products. The RFSA aims to establish a list of acceptable suppliers who can provide high-quality goods.

#### Eligible Products
The supply arrangement is divided into categories presented in Annexes A1 and A2 of the solicitation, which includes a range of electrical and electronic products, such as:

* Electrical cable and accessories
* Electronic component parts and raw materials
* Distribution and control centers
* Electrical boxes and enclosures
* Electrical controls and accessories
* and more

#### Eligibility and Invitation to Quotation (ITQ)
Existing qualified suppliers with a valid supply agreement in this series are not required to submit an offer. New suppliers, however, must be qualified in order to participate in the supply arrangement.

#### Contact Information
For further inquiries about the RFSA, please contact:

Steve Dumaresq
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
Email: [steve.dumaresq@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:steve.dumaresq@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### How to Participate
To obtain a copy of the solicitation documentation and submit an offer, please visit the Ariba Contracting Portal at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18166573?extsite=MTgxNjY1NzNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that this RFSA also includes trade agreements: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and trade regions: Canada.
